#Dealing with Code Scan Findings# ##What are code scan findings?## Pulse adminstrators can configure rules for scanning updates to ensure good practices are observed. Code scan findings appear as a related list on the the development request. ![Screenshot](scanFindingsRL.png) ##What should I do with code scan findings on my development requests?## Hovering over the Lead Comments will reveal the full text. ![Screenshot](scanFindingsLeadComments.png) Users with the x_wms_pulse.developer_lead role are able to update the Lead Comments when needed to send a personalized message to the developer.

In the case that scan issues are expected, developers can enter Developer Comments, which must then be reviewed by a developer lead.

A developer lead must select an Action for the disputed findings. The possible actions are: * Accept: the lead accepts the developer comments and the finding will not prevent code promotion * Ignore: the lead may choose ignore at any point if a finding is a false positive * Remediate: the lead may choose remediate, which will prevent the code from promoting until the finding has been dealt with or a subsequent scan does not trigger the finding ***A development request cannot be promoted while unaddressed code scan findings exist!***
